POP_OVER_DESCRIPTION_1: is a sum of the regular OD limit, temporary OD limit (if applicable) and ad hoc OD limit (if applicable).
POP_OVER_DESCRIPTION_2: OD limit = Regular OD limit + Temp. OD limit + Ad hoc limit
AVG_MONTHLY_BALANCE_POP_TEXT: This is your average ‘end of day’ account balance for this month
INSTALLMENT_HELP_2: is the amount by which OD limit will be reduced, at the end of every month
OVER_DRAFT_POP_TEXT: This is your average ‘end of day’ overdraft limit utilised this month
AVAILABLE_BALANCE_POP_TEXT_2: account balance to overdraft limit (if applicable) and
AVAILABLE_BALANCE_POP_TEXT_4: Net with. balance = A/c balance + OD limit - hold funds.
RETAIL_SWEEP_IN_BALANCE_POP_TEXT: Combined balances from linked fixed deposit(s) and savings/current account(s). Balances from linked accounts will be utilised in case of insufficient funds.
RETAIL_AVAILABLE_BALANCE_POP_TEXT_2: Account balance to Sweep balances and OD limits and
RETAIL_AVAILABLE_BALANCE_POP_TEXT_4: (Account Balance + Sweeps + OD Limit - Hold funds)
ACCOUNT_INACTIVE_MESSAGE: This account is Inactive because it has had no customer induced financial transactions since 12 months. Please initiate a financial transaction to activate it.
ACCOUNT_DORMANT_MESSAGE: This account is Dormant because it has had no customer induced financial transactions since 24 months. Please reach out to the nearest branch with any one of the Officially Valid Documents (OVDs) (updated by the RBI from time to time) or contact our Banker on Call number for details.
NAME: Name
WCDL_DISCLAIMER: * The utilised amount may take up to 24 hours to update after disbursement.

FREE_CASH_DEPOSIT_LIMIT_MESSAGE: This is free limit up to which cash can be deposited in the account in a calendar month
